dict.acceptation: 心，精神，心力，知，智力，智慧；心胸，头脑，人；愿望，目的，意向，意志，决心，见解，意见；记忆，记性，记忆力，回想；
专心于；介意；愿意做；照顾；

sent.orig: When you go through it, you cease to derive your identity from your psychological, mind-made form.
sent.trans: 当你通过它，你停止接受来自心理，心智创造的形相(psychological,mind-madeform)的认同。

sent.orig: The effect of glucose lowering on cognitive function will be determined by the ongoing ACCORD-MIND trial.
sent.trans: 正在进行的ACCORD-MIND试验会评价降糖对认知能力的影响。

sent.orig: The mind is as much part of it as the flesh.
sent.trans: 心智(mind)和肉体同样是它的一部分。

sent.orig: Mind has urged people not to feel they must start 2009 armed with resolutions for self-improvement.
sent.trans: 慈善组织Mind规劝人们摒弃新年新气象，制订2009年新年大计的固有做法。

sent.orig: Our mind is divided in two parts; Conscious mind & subconscious mind.
sent.trans: 我们的意识划分为两部分：显意识及潜意识。
